creator: michael@montuori.net
text:
The scp task does not handle password with special characters like "@", this 
cause a problem is used, I found out that the password is retrieved using an 
indexOf function as the following:

setPassword(uri.substring(indexOfColon + 1, indexOfAt));

this would fail is the secure password is user user:p@ssword@host:/dir.

Consider using lastIndexOf method for it.

Created attachment 17314
Correct issue with password containing special characters

Line # 263 now contains
int indexOfAt = uri.lastIndexOf('@');
instead of
int indexOfAt = uri.indexOf('@');

this gets around password with special characters like "p@ssword"
